questions: Is there a scroll in the image?
Is there a desk in the image?
Is there an inkwell in the image?
Is the scroll unrolled on the desk?
Is the inkwell behind the scroll?
model_output:
yes, because there is a scroll in the image partially rolled and placed on a larger piece of parchment.
yes, because the items are placed on a flat surface resembling a desk.
yes, because there is an inkwell present in the image, to the upper right on the desk.
no, because the scroll is not fully unrolled; it is partially rolled on a larger piece of parchment.
yes, because the inkwell is positioned behind the scroll on the desk.
